renewed-contributions.title: Thunder Moon-Squawman (Red Wind and Thunder Moon)
renewed-contributions.note: Author is Frederick Faust writing under a pseudonym. Title as given in CCE renewal records, which note this as the fifth installment.  FictionMags notes it as the first installment of 'Thunder Moon-Squawman'.

renewed-contributions.title: Thunder Moon-Squawman (Red Wind and Thunder Moon)
